00158 inline CVector2d CVector2d::GetHorizontalTranslated(double offsetX) const

00160        return CVector2d(GetX() + offsetX, GetY());

00162 
00163 
00164 inline CVector2d CVector2d::GetVerticalTranslated(double offsetY) const

00169 
00170 inline double CVector2d::GetCrossProductZ(const imath::TVector<2>& vector) const
00171 {
00172        return GetX() * vector[1] - GetY() * vector[0];
00173 }
00174 
00175 
00176 inline double CVector2d::GetAngle() const
00177 {
00178        return ::atan2(GetY(), GetX());
00179 }
00180 
00181 
00182 inline CVector2d CVector2d::operator-() const
00183 {

00196 inline CVector2d CVector2d::operator-(const imath::TVector<2>& vector) const

00203 inline CVector2d CVector2d::operator*(double scalar) const

00210 inline CVector2d CVector2d::operator/(double scalar) const
00211 {
00212        if (::fabs(scalar) < I_BIG_EPSILON){
00213               scalar = (scalar > 0)? I_BIG_EPSILON: -I_BIG_EPSILON;
00214        }
00215 
00216        return CVector2d(GetX() / scalar, GetY() / scalar);
00217 }
